channel.title: A couple questions
channel.description: I am making a gaming engine for cheezscape, and i am trying to add a button that changes the energy of the account to unlimited.Where in the script do i find the energy, and when i find it, what value do i set it to? Or how? Also, i want to make it so that there is a button that makes it so that the player faster. How would i set the player speed? One more question: Say i made a model for use of the game, how do i go about importing it and what file type must it be (will .obj work?) Thanks Shnee[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 29, 2008, 01:28:40 pm[/size][hr]*bump* Anyone?

item.title: A couple questions
item.dc:creator: @shnee shnee
item.description:
@shnee wrote:

I am making a gaming engine for cheezscape, and i am trying to add a button that changes the energy of the account to unlimited.Where in the script do i find the energy, and when i find it, what value do i set it to? Or how? Also, i want to make it so that there is a button that makes it so that the player faster. How would i set the player speed? One more question: Say i made a model for use of the game, how do i go about importing it and what file type must it be (will .obj work?) Thanks
Shnee[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 29, 2008, 01:28:40 pm[/size][hr]bump
